title: [Admission]I'm stuck with ee in rr campus

comments.body: You can change your branch after first year I think
Getting 8+ CGPA in first year will be good enough for branch change to ece
Do yk when the last date to withdraw the seat is?ðŸ˜”

I heard someone say they pushed it to 25thðŸ’”
(Also doesn't pes follow ugc refund policy?)

https://preview.redd.it/59k94futogef1.png?width=1080&format=png&auto=webp&s=f2e5acf5ae49c426b16a9e118232b1ee54f19d84

I would trust this more than anything ig .. and it makes sense cuz before 2nd round only you must withdraw seats and even the speech during 1st counselling mentioned it .. that on 2nd round there would be no option to withdraw .. only before 2nd round it's possible .. but now due to this extra kcet round idk if thats true .. they might've changed the date on website if something was gonna be different tho
But according to ugc policy the last date to withdraw the seat is usually in end Sept or october, aren't they legally required to follow that?

Pes won't follow it unless it's from KCET .. cuz management quota and JEE counselling are different and even have different dates of counselling .. the only thing they should follow is to give 15+ days for surrendering seats after allotment through the first round only .. as second round is last one it's obvious no college will give u chance to surrender seat cuz u can't fill it because there is no more allotment round for the same seat ..

Aah I guess that makes sense 
Just had a doubt cause they've mentioned on their website that they follow ugc refund policy.
So not adhering to it would be very shady
Maybe yes .. but they might call "JEE Quota" a special category of seat allotment .. then they won't have to follow UGC rules anymore ..
